Load catalog data from a YAML file.

Returns:

Loaded catalog data.

data_processing.data_preprocessing module

src.data_processing.data_preprocessing.convert_c_seg_to_binary(df: DataFrame) → DataFrame[source]

Convert the ‘C_seg’ column in the DataFrame to binary.

Parameters:

df (pd.DataFrame) – Input DataFrame containing the ‘C_seg’ column.

Returns:

DataFrame with the ‘C_seg’ column converted to binary:

  • 1 if ‘C_seg’ is ‘AFFLUENT’.

  • 0 otherwise.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

src.data_processing.data_preprocessing.convert_float64_to_float32(df: DataFrame) → DataFrame[source]

Convert float64 columns to float32 for efficiency.

Parameters:

df (pd.DataFrame) – Input DataFrame.

Returns:

DataFrame with float64 columns converted to float32.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

src.data_processing.data_preprocessing.drop_outliers(df: DataFrame, num_columns: List[str], threshold: float = 3.0) → DataFrame[source]

Drop outliers from specified numerical columns using z-score.

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – The input DataFrame.

  • num_columns (List[str]) – List of numerical column names to be processed.

  • threshold (float) – Z-score threshold for outlier detection. Default is 3.0.

Returns:

DataFrame with outliers removed from specified columns.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

src.data_processing.data_preprocessing.impute_missing_data(df: DataFrame) → DataFrame[source]

Impute missing values in the DataFrame.

Parameters:

df (pd.DataFrame) – Input DataFrame containing missing values.

Returns:

DataFrame with missing values imputed.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

src.data_processing.data_preprocessing.perform_eda_with_sweetviz(df: DataFrame, target_feat: str | None = None, html_file_path: str | None = None) → None[source]

Perform Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) using Sweetviz library and optionally save the report to an HTML file.

Parameters:

  • df (pandas.DataFrame) – The DataFrame containing the dataset for analysis.

  • target_feat (str, optional) – The name of the target feature. Defaults to None.

  • html_file_path (str, optional) – Path to save the HTML report. Defaults to None.

data_processing.data_sampling module

src.data_processing.data_sampling.resample_data(df: DataFrame, target_column: str, categorical_features: List[str]) → Tuple[DataFrame, Series][source]

Apply RandomUnderSampler and SMOTENC to the DataFrame to balance the dataset. Will apply undersampling first before oversampling.

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing features and the target variable.

  • target_column (str) – The name of the target column.

  • categorical_features (List[str]) – List of column names for categorical features.

Returns:

A tuple containing the resampled features DataFrame and

the resampled target Series.

Return type:

Tuple[pd.DataFrame, pd.Series]
